attributes.action: Investigate why a 60 year, single, ex-soldier, should be told that he is not considered ...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: eligible to receive cancer treatment, but would have received it if he had been a single mother.   This person has served his country, paid his taxes, and worked for others all his life.   The system has already paid out a large amount for chemo treatment, yet now, at a crucial phase, refuses to fund a meagre £10K on the final treatment ?

rejection.details: The PM cannot intervene in individual cases - you need to broaden out the scope of your petition to encompass all such cases
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
